original_text: The people wanted to take hold of Jesus so that they could make him their king. But Jesus knew that they wanted to do this. So he went away to the hills again by himself.
korean_text: 그러므로 예수께서 그들이 와서 자기를 억지로 붙들어 임금으로 삼으려는 줄 아시고 다시 혼자 산으로 떠나 가시니라

sentences.original_text: The people wanted to take hold of Jesus
so that they could make him their king
that they wanted to do this
So he went away to the hills again
